CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 11 Our preliminary investigation on the photovoltaic properties of PCDSeBT in typical BHJ devices with [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) shows a highly respectrable PCE of 4.12% on account of the high J SC and V OC .

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDSeBT: This is a specific type of material, likely a blend of organic semiconductors, used in photovoltaic devices. It is the Material Name entity in this context.
2. [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM): This is another specific material, likely a fullerene derivative, used in the photovoltaic devices. It is also a Material Name entity.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDSeBT |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 11 Our preliminary investigation on the photovoltaic properties of PCDSeBT in typical BHJ devices with [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) shows a highly respectrable PCE of 4.12% on account of the high J SC and V OC .

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDSeBT: This is a specific type of photovoltaic material or polymer blend. It can be considered as a "Property Name" entity, representing the name of the material being investigated for its photovoltaic properties.
2. [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM): This is another specific type of material, acting as a fullerene derivative, used in the BHJ devices. It can also be considered as a "Property Name" entity, representing the name of the material used in conjunction with PCDSeBT.
3. PCE: This stands for Power Conversion Efficiency, which is a measure of the efficiency of a photovoltaic device in converting solar energy into electrical energy. It can be considered as a "Property Name" entity, representing the specific efficiency value achieved in the investigation.
4. J SC: This stands for Short Circuit Current Density, which is a measure of the maximum current that can be generated by a photovoltaic device under short circuit conditions. It can be considered as a "Property Name" entity, representing the specific value achieved in the investigation.
5. V OC: This stands for Open Circuit Voltage, which is a measure of the maximum voltage that can be generated by a photovoltaic device under open circuit conditions. It can be considered as a "Property Name" entity, representing the specific value achieved in the investigation.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PCDSeBT: This is a specific type of photovoltaic material or polymer blend. It can be considered as a "Property Name" entity, representing the name of the material being investigated for its photovoltaic properties.
2. PC71BM: This is another specific type of material, acting as a fullerene derivative, used in the BHJ devices. It can also be considered as a "Property Name" entity, representing the name of the material used in conjunction with PCDSeBT.
3. PCE: This stands for Power Conversion Efficiency, which is a measure of the efficiency of a photovoltaic device in converting solar energy into electrical energy. It can be considered as a "Property Name" entity, representing the specific efficiency value achieved in the investigation.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCDSeBT |
| PC71BM |
| Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 11 Our preliminary investigation on the photovoltaic properties of PCDSeBT in typical BHJ devices with [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) shows a highly respectrable PCE of 4.12% on account of the high J SC and V OC .

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDSeBT: This is a specific type of photovoltaic material or polymer blend. It can be considered a "Property Value Entity" with the property being the photovoltaic material itself.
2. 4.12%: This is the percentage of power conversion efficiency (PCE) for the photovoltaic device using PCDSeBT. It is a numerical value representing a property of the device.
3. high J SC: This refers to the high short-circuit current density (J SC) of the device. It is a property of the device.
4. V OC: This refers to the open-circuit voltage (VOC) of the device. It is a property of the device.
5. [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM): This is another specific type of material used in the photovoltaic device. It can be considered a "Property Value Entity" with the property being the material itself. However, it is also mentioned as a contributing factor to the high J SC and VOC, so it could also be considered a cause or factor rather than just a property value.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PCDSeBT: This is a specific type of photovoltaic material with a property value of 4.12% for its power conversion efficiency (PCE).
2. high J SC: This refers to a property value of high short-circuit current density (J SC) for the photovoltaic device.
3. V OC: This refers to a property value of high open-circuit voltage (VOC) for the photovoltaic device.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE of PCDSeBT: 4.12% |
| High J SC |
| High VOC |
